entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:58 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Woodstock 2:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to rain this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18 except minus 23 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18 except minus 23 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
